dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.loc.geo.address.UrbanPropertyAddress
dataStructure.description:
An UrbanPropertyAddress is a structured textual way of describing how to find a Property in an urban area (country properties are often defined differently). It is usually composed of an ordered list of Location names based on context specific rulesThis is an example of a concrete Geographic Location entity.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: UrbanPropertyAddress

child.name: streetNrFirst
child.description:
number identifying a specific property on a public street. It may be combined with streetNrLast for ranged addresses

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetNrFirst

child.name: streetNrFirstSuffix
child.description:
the first street number suffix

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetNrFirstSuffix

child.name: streetNrLast
child.description:
the last number in a range of street numbers allocated to a property

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetNrLast

child.name: streetNrLastSuffix
child.description:
the last street number suffix for a ranged address

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetNrLastSuffix

child.name: streetName
child.description:
the name of the street or other street type

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetName

child.name: streetType
child.description:
alley, avenue, boulevard, brae, crescent, drive, highway, lane, terrace, parade, place, tarn, way, wharf ?

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetType

child.name: streetSuffix
child.description:
A modifier denoting a relative direction

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: streetSuffix

child.name: postcode
child.description:
A descriptor for a postal delivery area, used to speed and simplify the delivery of mail.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: postcode

child.name: locality
child.description:
"An area of defined or undefined boundaries within a local authority or other legislatively defined area, usually rural or semi rural in nature." [ANZLIC-STREET], or a suburb "a bounded locality within a city, town or shire principally of urban character " [ANZLIC-STREET]

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: locality

child.name: property
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PropertyAddressAssociation

This association end is optional
child.label: property
